intelligence.statisticsTip: When building the knowledge graph again, the system will recalculate the statistics
intelligence.domainIQTip1: Measuring the Cognitive Ability and Value of Domain Knowledge Networks
intelligence.domainIQTip2: Domain IQ = Knowledge score * Quality score
intelligence.knwSourceTip1: Criteria for evaluating the amount of knowledge in knowledge graphs
intelligence.totalKnwTip: Entity * Entity properties + Relationship * Relationship properties
intelligence.qualitySourceTip1: Comprehensive metrics for assessing duplication rates and missing values in Knowledge graph data
intelligence.qualitySourceTip2: Quality score = (1 - repetition rate) + (1 - missing ratio) / 2
